Transcription for 1003621

On Rachel's Lord, descend and dwell, I make and walk in every rest.
Then shall we know, and taste, and feel, The joys that cannot be expressed.
Now to the God whose power can do, For ever lost and which shall go,
Be ever watching over us, and I, By all the church, through Christ his Son.
O Christ, in all the hand of fear, Thee I have won, the hand of fear,
Near and in all the world's rising, On the high His love of faith.
O Christ, in all the hand of faith, Thee I have won, the hand of faith,
Near and in all the world's rising, On the high His love of faith.
Be ever watching over us, and I, By all the church, through Christ his Son.
O Christ, in all the hand of faith, Thee I have won, the hand of faith.
